body:
I'm trying to install mysql ,but when build, there are two errors:
ocal/spack/var/spack/stage/mysql-5.7.25-3ltbh4ch5ufssm7xhimtix3zy4vnlqku/mysql-5.7.25/sql/item_buff.cc
###   **>> 5945    /usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lboost_system
  >> 5946    /usr/bin/ld: cannot find -lboost_chrono
  >> 5947    collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
  >> 5948    make[2]: *** [client/dump/CMakeFiles/mysqlpump.dir/build.make:91: client/dump/mysqlpump] Error 1
     5949    make[2]: Leaving directory '/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-t15E3u/spack-build'
  >> 5950    make[1]: *** [CMakeFiles/Makefile2:7559: client/dump/CMakeFiles/mysqlpump.dir/all] Error 2**
     5951    make[1]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
     5952    [ 81%] Building CXX object libmysqld/CMakeFiles/sql_embedded.dir/__/sql/item_cmpfunc.cc.o
     5953    cd /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-t15E3u/spack-build/libmysqld && /usr/local/spack/lib/spack/env/gcc/g++  -DEMBEDDED_LIBRARY -DHAVE_CONFIG_H -DHAVE_LI
             BEVENT1 -DMYSQL_SERVER -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -D_GNU_SOURCE -I/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-t15E3u/spack-build/include -I/usr/local/spack/var/spack/s
             tage/mysql-5.7.25-3ltbh4ch5ufssm7xhimtix3zy4vnlqku/mysql-5.7.25/extra/rapidjson/include -I/tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-t15E3u/spack-build/libbinloge
             vents/include -I/usr/local/spack/var/spack/stage/mysql-5.7.25-3ltbh4ch5ufssm7xhimtix3zy4vnlqku/mysql-5.7.25/libbinlogevents/export -I/usr/local/spack/var
            
         My OS is ubuntu18.04 on ARM64,. Could anyone help me to solve it? Thanks!
title: Cannot install mysql beause there are two error,how to solve?
